pages.text: Pixons are the physical manifestation of the natural energy of the world, occurring when the energy breaches the surface.
pages.title: Pixons

pages.text: They can then be 'harvested' by gathering the fountaining energies with an $(thing)Attuning Bowl$(), which will crystallise into either $(thing)Energy Stones$() or $(thing)Power Stones$()$(br2)The more powerful the natural energies of the world, the more likely you are to see higher power $(thing)Pixons$()
